Message: At last, the time has come—

Everything is different
from that fateful day.
My comrades... My enemy...

But, I know what I must do.
That hasn’t changed.

I march into battle
to fight for my comrades,

But, my anxiety and my trauma
still torment me like shackles...

Do I have what it takes to pull
the trigger without hesitation?

Will my anxiety bring misfortune
to my comrades—to him?
